title: Will the global internet system be divided? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is a possibility of breaking down the current united form of the Internet. Some countries have been trying to create their own Internet system for years. In the face of national security threats in the cyber world, countries are worried about establishing sovereign power over the internet. Russia is taking visible steps to create its own 'Internet' President Vladimir Putin last month passed a new law to create such a system. Last month, Iran announced it had finished 80 percent of the 'national data network' project. The project is part of building Iran's own 'Internet' system. Till now China is ahead of everyone else. Attempts to detach China from the US-controlled global Internet system are now known as "The Great Firewall of China".
